name: The Cave Of Sound
description:
Explore a mysterious cave as a poem gets read to you.

For this GDKO entry, I wanted to go a more personal route, so I decided to make a game that's mixed in with a poem, along with some interesting puzzle mechanics about playing music.  I hope you enjoy the game. This game is devoted to my grandad, who is currently sick in hospital after suffering hypothermia and a fall last week. Get well soon.
